Constructs a discpp::Context object.

discpp::Context ctx(bot, channel, author, message, arguments);
Parameters
[in]botThe discpp bot.
[in]channelThe channel the command was ran in.
[in]authorThe author of the message that executed the command.
[in]messageThe message that was sent by the player
[in]argumentsThe command arguments
Returns
discpp::Context, this is a constructor.

Member Function Documentation

◆ Send()

discpp::Message discpp::Context::Send ( const std::string &  text,
const bool  tts = false,
discpp::EmbedBuilder *  embed = nullptr,
std::vector< discpp::File >  files = {} 
)

Sends a text message (Shortcut for channel.send(text, tts, embed, files)).

ctx.Send("Hello, I'm a bot!"); // Sending text
ctx.Send("", false, embed); // Sending an embed
ctx.Send("Command output was too large to fit in an embed.", false, nullptr, { file }); // Sending files
Parameters
[in]textThe text that will be sent.
[in]ttsIf the text could be spoken through text to speech.
[in]embedOptional embed to send
[in]filesOption files to send
Returns
discpp::Message
